headline: Firm doesn't have any strategy
pros:
Lot of PR buzz
Sounds good on the outside
cons:
Product hasn't evolved in 3 years and the hype is fading
Management is not well versed in the industry
Firm is running out of money, no funding

headline: Employee
pros:
Free lunch on Friday
Office in SoHo
cons:
--Toxic environment--leadership has no connection to employees
--The leadership treats employees unfairly and employees see no benefits
--Often changing contract that was originally signed to join on
--Lies about number of users and what the product is capable of doing 
--No structure and leadership in the company at all
--Managers are placed in the completely wrong positions--they have no idea of the business or what they are doing at all

headline: Global disruptor in finance
pros: Global disruptor in financial services, top 50 fintech firms. Huge growth, lot of media coverage and exciting work opportunities. Disrupting Reuters and Bloomberg globally.
cons: Growing too fast, not structured enough yet for the growth.
